description.en:
This task type requires the player to reach a specified location.
For this task, the player is required to reach the specified range of the end.
description.ru:
This task type requires the player to reach a specified location.
For this task, the player is required to reach the specified range of the end.
description.zh:
该任务类型需要玩家到达指定位置。
对于该任务，需要玩家到达末地的指定范围。
